title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the dismal state of the Lakers falling to 0-4 to start the season and why it's time to take drastic measures in order to turn things around. He discusses Aaron Rodgers defending his stance to criticize teammates and the main point he's missing when it comes to being a super star QB. He believes the Super Bowl Bubble is the smallest group of teams it has been in years and explains why the Eagles belong in that class. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to give his analysis of the flaws in the Buccaneers offense and what's led to Joe Burrow's resurgence from last years run to the Super Bowl. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
